channel.title: Hello! I'm Herena. on Herena Li
channel.description: Recent content in Hello! I'm Herena. on Herena Li

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! I’m Herena Li, a developer and artist from Hong Kong. I’m currently specialising in Computer Science and minoring in Linguistics at the University of Toronto.

item.title: Gradient Map Filter
item.description: A web app for applying customizable gradient map filters to photos.

item.title: MurrBot
item.description: An AI Chatbot fine-tuned on lines of the character Murr from the Japanese mobile game Promise of Wizard.

item.title: The Critter Creator
item.description: A simple dress-up game where players can design their own critter.
